question: List all students.
context: CREATE TABLE students (StudentId INT, Name NVARCHAR(100), Email NVARCHAR(100), CreatedAt DATETIME2);

question: Show all teachers.
context: CREATE TABLE teachers (TeacherId INT, Name NVARCHAR(100), Department NVARCHAR(50), CreatedAt DATETIME2);

context: CREATE TABLE students (StudentId INT, Name NVARCHAR(100), Email NVARCHAR(100), CreatedAt DATETIME2);

context: CREATE TABLE courses (CourseId INT, Title NVARCHAR(100), Credits INT, CreatedAt DATETIME2);
